Room.Name: Marlea's Hut
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the hut of Marlea, the youngest daughter of Mehetable.
Room.LongDescription: A large mirror hangs on the wall and there's even one on the ceiling over the largest feather bed you have ever seen. Partially hidden from view is a small satchel filled with eye liner, lip blush and other cosmetics. The satchel would be burned if Mehetable knew of it.
